title: FEEDERS, PLAYERS WITH BAD NAMES, PLAYERS WHO DON'T TAKE RANKED SERIOUSLY, ENOUGH!
body:
Why the F**K, do I have to suffer massive que timers, when I dodge Ranked Games because I get stuck in lobby with people named smurfBOXsmasher and people who are (Not going to name) tilted and lost 4 games in a row? I'm trying to avoid the toxic people in league because I don't handle toxicity very well, and MUTING IS NOT A F**KING SOLUTION RIOT WHEN THEY'RE RUNNING IT DOWN MID AND PUSHING YOUR LANE UP, TAKING CS OR JUST BEING OVERALL SHIT BAGS! Everyone has a bad game for time to time, I can understand that, but when is it time to say enough is enough?

I'm trying to keep ranked as civil as possible, ever since I started to dodge games with people who have stupid names or just say dumb shit in chat, my win to loss ratio this season has dramatically changed. So if I'm doing something like dodging frequently when I get into lobby with people who are obviously trolling or just tilted way to hard for reasons I wouldn't condemn but at the same time I don't condone playing with people who need to take a break and I'm WINNING MORE EVER SINCE I STARTED DOING THIS>>>>>>>> WHY AM I HAVING THESE F***ED que times???!! 

Please just remove them, for me lmao.

Anyone else having a similar predicament as me? 

Rant over... {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}} 

Nas ery day {{champion:75}} {{summoner:6}} {{summoner:12}}

My last lobby...

replies.body: the mute button and disabling ign's is your best friend here.

I totally agree with you, I quit ranked ages ago cause of the stupid fing people in this game. just trolling and shit like that. I just dodged a game cause some trolling idiot who picked Yasuo when he was sup and was claiming he was running down mid. then I lost another game straight after (in promo's) due to 3 other lanes feeding, doing stupid shit and feeding the enemy adc and I got rejected from promotion because I dodged one game and lost one. this is fucking stupid, fix your fucking game.
All i can say is... Noice winrate
I don't wanna fist bump that. It's spiky.
